title: Did the Mayor of London Sadiq Khan defend terrorists 9/11?
subtitle: Rumors have spread that Sadiq Khan defended 11 September 2001 terrorists along with an irrelevant video after the June 2017 attacks in London.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The video of the Mayor of London Sadiq Khan, who defends terrorists on 11 September, is filmed either orally or ideologically or as their lawyer.
